reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 275/09: EXCLUSION OF JURORS FROM CORONERS INQUESTS
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXCLUSION OF JURORS FROM CORONERS INQUESTS

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 34 (6) of the Act, the following are prescribed as matters that may be grounds for disqualification of a juror because of interest or bias: 1. Direct pecuniary or personal interest. 2. Personal hostility. 3. Personal friendship. 4. Family relationship. 5. Professional or vocational relationship. 6. Employer-employee relationship. O. Reg. 275/09, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsection 34 (6) of the Act, the following are prescribed as matters that may be grounds for disqualification of a juror because of interest or bias:

1. Direct pecuniary or personal interest.

2. Personal hostility.

3. Personal friendship.

4. Family relationship.

5. Professional or vocational relationship.

6. Employer-employee relationship. O. Reg. 275/09, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 275/09, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 275/09, s. 2.

Français
